We recognize how busy you are. And we’re here to help. Our counselors and advisors will give you the road map and resources you’ll need to successfully complete your DePaul degree. Choose from one of the following DePaul degree programs at Harper College University Center: Undergraduate Bachelor of Arts in Communication and Media College of CommunicationNow enrolling students for Fall The Communication and Media program is designed for students interested in multiple fields of communication, and will prepare you for a wide range of career opportunities in the communication industry. View course preparation information Bachelor of Arts in Professional Studies with a major in Business Administration Professional Studies BA with theSchool of Continuing and Professional StudiesNow enrolling students for Winter and Fall The Business Administration program will help you develop the leadership and managerial skills you need to advance your career.
